section.title: CoverageStore
section.para: CoverageStore are still in incubation. They have been developped to give us a level of abstraction higher than CoverageReaders in order to manipulate N Coverages at the same time. The database class from Coverage-SQL will implement this interface. It's possible that this model could change with the time.

section.title: CoverageStoreFactory
section.para: The factory are using to make CoverageStores. Each factory have its own name and the definition of its input paramaters that it need to create a new CoverageStore instance.

Factory implementations are registered in the Java Service Registry (META-INF/services). They enable automatic discovery of new implementations. The utility class CoveragestoreFinder give us the possibity to get them quickly.
